title: I've Become Disenchanted With the Game
body:
Is there anybody else? I used to be in love with this game. I could spend hours playing and not be bored or frustrated, even after losses. Recently, though, I find myself sitting in front of the computer like a robot, locking into ranked queue day after day. Nothing really comes of it. On anybody's first death, the toxicity is already at extremely high levels. Eventually you have to mute 3 or for people, and then there's no social interaction. It's like this in normals, ARAM, ranked, hell, even in 3's. Now, I just find myself dragging through soloqueue having flame wars with every person that gets mad 2 minutes in and says "gg" if a teammate gives up first blood. 

Is there a cure for the way this game has become a time killer instead of a hobby? I really do want to enjoy it again. I've been playing for 5+ years, and put lots of money into playing. I've logged so many hours just because I'm devoted to it. But I don't really see myself lasting much longer.

This season, I find myself enjoying the game a lot less unless I'am playing a bruiser or tank who can actually survive an assassin's all in. Did really well in my laning phase as Malzahar? Zed still beats me mid to late game unless I go off-tank, which usually means being forced to buy an hourglass. My favorite character Dr. Mundo became overpowered, so now I fear he might go the same way as Gragas or Urgot; niche pick, becomes overpowered, gets nerfs to hell because some pro decided to use him. I had fun playing Jhin, during the moments I wasn't be instagibbed by assassins like Akali or Rengar. Attack Damage itemization in this game is ridicules, to the point I don't even bother with Magic Resistance anymore since all the damage is going to be coming from AD Assassins and health does well against both attack and magic damage; why even bother with magic resistance besides maybe a Banshee's Veil to block some of that assassin burst and the occasionally annoying AP character that limped its way into battle with its less then stellar itemization, only to die to an Assassin that scales better. I only have fun playing bruisers this season, since I like to actually play rather then be instantly killed.
